trends: There have been 33 other sightings in Vancouver
There was one other sighting in Vancouver on or around August 10th 2010
divs: sighting detailsi have had 31 encounter's with these fast moving orbs of light, some of them just moving slow, all of them during dusk or night. i have had 5 witnesses during 5 of the 31 encounters. i was walking to the store that early evening and looked down the street towards the mountains and spotted this red\orange orb of light just hovering approximately a mile away. i was quite excited as the week before, i saw 5 in nanaimo b.c, canada during the night with 2 other witnesses. it is apparent with all the nasa\ufo research that i have done over the last few years, these encounters are in similarity with the orbs of light quite prevalent with what nasa knows. i have a contact which goes by the name of *(name removed--cms\sg) from bowen island b.c, who recorded the nasa information and my encounters are very similar with those phenomenon discovered by *(name removed--cms\sg). it's interesting these times we are in. thank you for your continued research and support of this most divine and universal revelation manifesting amongst the human soul species. sincerely, **(wit's name removed--cms\sg).
Summary: Red/Orange orb of light in east Vancouver
